channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ KTH on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: If You Want to Be Robust, Be Wary of Initialization
item.description: Proper weight initialization significantly boosts Graph Neural Network (GNN) and Deep Neural Network (DNN) robustness against adversarial attacks, highlighting a critical, often-overlooked factor.

item.title: Model-free Low-Rank Reinforcement Learning via Leveraged Entry-wise Matrix Estimation
item.description: LoRa-PI: a model-free RL algorithm learns and exploits low-rank MDP structures for order-optimal sample complexity, achieving Œµ-optimal policies with O(poly(A)) samples.
